name: surface-files
title: Surface Files
description: Surface all files with a given extension from a selected folder (including subfolders) into a new sibling folder at the same level as the selected folder.
author: emilbeh

commands.name: surface-copy
commands.title: Surface + Copy
commands.description: Copies files into a new sibling folder. Originals stay.

commands.name: surface-move
commands.title: Surface + Move
commands.description: Moves files into a new sibling folder. Originals are removed.

preferences.name: confirmLimit
preferences.title: Limit
preferences.description: The maximum number of files to be extracted at once. If the limit is exceeded, a confirmation dialog will appear.

preferences.name: excludeExtensions
preferences.title: Exclude Extensions
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of file extensions to ignore

preferences.name: includeHiddenFiles
preferences.title: Include Hidden Files
preferences.description: Whether to include hidden files in the extraction process.
preferences.label: Include hidden files

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
